title: Why The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is Nate's Game of the Decade | The Joy of  Gaming
description:
Subscribe to Escapist Magazine! ►► http://bit.ly/Sub2Escapist

The decade is over and Nate takes some time to look back at The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt and why it's his personal game of the decade.

Want to see the next episode a week early? Check out http://www.escapistmagazine.com for the latest episodes of your favorite shows.

title: Yahtzee and Kess Play A Hat in Time | Stream Archive
description:
